review: Wife loves it, watches movies and Amazon  shows. Although our TV had aUSB port, it seems that the power output was to low and we had to hook upthe separate power supply to an extension outlet. Unit works great.
author: WOLF F.

review: Very easy to use and works perfectly.
author: Susan

review: I like it. Only "complaint" is that the remote could be better. Still, I like it. I would recommend this product because it is cheaper than a Roku stick - and it works. I have a Roku stick, too. Like this unit better because it was $10 cheaper.
author: Daniel Edgar

review: Overall it has been good, but occasionally the picture will freeze while the audio keeps playing.
author: jae-rar

review: OMG I love it! So easy to use and set up was a breeze.
author: jena hartley

review: I'm a little disappointed by the fire stick. It always loses connection to my wifi and I need to restart it and reconnect. Doesn't have as many movies and programs as I thought it would have. Aside from that its pretty cool and Netflix works great.
author: Forrest Taggart

review: Fire stick is great watching it on my tv instead of my phone is great!!
author: Putina Warren

review: like taking it on trips can watch good stuff for free
author: Amazon Customer
